name: Back to the Future: Ep 2 - Get Tannen!

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Telltale Games/Back to the Future The Game/Episode 2/BackToTheFuture102.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Telltale Games/Back to the Future The Game/Episode 2/BackToTheFuture102.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:

    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
